summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where two characters are engaged in combat on a snowy battlefield. The character in the foreground is wielding a large weapon and appears to be attacking another character dressed in traditional attire. A prompt on the screen instructs the player to "Roll or Dodge evade incoming attack" using the B button. The health bar at the bottom of the screen indicates the opponent is "Erlang, the Sacred Divinity," and a dialogue reads, "yet you spurned each one. Such ingratitude!" The interface on the right displays various icons, possibly representing abilities or items available to the player.
